basics.name: Lucy Farnik
basics.label: ML PhD Student
basics.summary: A PhD student in ML researching robustness and continual learning in LLM agents

work.name: University of Bristol
work.summary: Researching LLMs and LLM agents under Dr. Laurence Aitchison. 2023-24 was a taught year completed with first-class honours.

work.name: ML Alignment & Theory Scholars (MATS)
work.summary: Exploring SAE-based circuit analysis and static analysis under Neel Nanda and Arthur Conmy (Google DeepMind).

work.name: Bristol AI Safety Centre (BASC)
work.summary: Co-leading a small research lab focused on AI security; funded by Lightspeed Grants.

work.name: Alignment Research Engineer Accelerator (ARENA)
work.summary: High-intensity ML research program in the London SERI MATS office.

work.name: Longitude 103
work.summary: Became a senior developer at age 18. Led multiple B2B platforms, building several products solo across frontend, backend, DevOps, iOS, Android, and UX. Led a project that grew annual revenue from $30k to $300k, mainly due to new features and UX improvements I built.
